greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of terms in n-th row of triangle in A073932.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: a[1] := 1:for i from 2 to 500 do n := i:s := 1:while(n>1) do if isprime(n) then r := n-1: else r := n-n/ifactors(n)[2][1][1]; fi; n := r:s := s+1:od:a[i] := s:od:seq(a[k],k=1..500);
program: (define (A060681 n) (- n (A032742 n))) ;; See also code under A032742
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Aug 19 2002
ext: Offset corrected from 0 to 1 by _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 23 2017
